io.jenkins.plugins.analysis.warnings.gro.name: Build Generator
io.jenkins.plugins.analysis.warnings.gro.example:
ANALYSIS-ERROR: Error during analysis of #<PROJECT-SPEC cogimon-lwr-nightly:ocl {10060645E3}> Caused by: > Error during analysis of /media/local_data/jmoringe/tmp/project.DRJqnk/branch-toolchain-2.8/CMakeLists.txt Caused by: > > Could not resolve "${OCL_VERSION_MAJOR}.${OCL_VERSION_MINOR}" in find_package(…) expression.
In /media/local_data/jmoringe/jenkins/jobs/validate-recipes/workspace/distributions/roman16-humotion-nightly.distribution: 77 │ … [ "ros-catkin", "0.5.65" ],

io.jenkins.plugins.analysis.warnings.gro.name: Build Generator Dependencies
io.jenkins.plugins.analysis.warnings.gro.script:
import edu.hm.hafner.analysis.Severity
String fileName = "file" int lineNumber = 1 String nature = matcher.group(1) String name = matcher.group(2) String category = "DEPENDENCY-" + nature String message = "No provider for ${nature} ${name}"
builder.setFileName(fileName) .setLineStart(lineNumber) .setSeverity(Severity.WARNING_NORMAL) .setType("Build Generator Dependency") .setCategory(category) .setMessage(message)
return builder.buildOptional();

io.jenkins.plugins.analysis.warnings.gro.name: SBCL
